mapper.select: select m.mno, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.chck, m.mgr from memb m
select m.mno, m.name, m.email, m.tel, m.chck, m.mgr from memb m where m.mno=#{value}
mapper.insert: insert into memb(mno, name, email, tel, chck, mgr) values( #{memberNo}, #{name}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{confirmTel}, #{administrator});
mapper.update: update memb m set m.mno=#{memberNo}, m.name=#{name}, m.email=#{email}, m.tel=#{tel}, m.chck=#{confirmTel}, m.mgr=#{administrator} where mno=#{memberNo}
